title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and protect one of their own after Rocket’s past resurfaces.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers after King T'Challa's death.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his family on Pandora. A familiar threat returns to finish what was started.

title: The Batman
description: Batman investigates Gotham’s corruption when a sadistic killer leaves a trail of cryptic clues.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A musician helps a young singer find fame even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.
